comment.author: Kendra
comment.text: Trump's mouth is just the right size for a used Tampon!! Someone plug one in it....Please?

replies.author: John
replies.text: If anyone wants to make the right choice look at what will be best for the country. If your doing it because you like one candidate more than the other your ignorant. Go to an unbiased source. Wiki leaks is bringing out the truth. Don't vote until you've researched it. Due diligence .
